attributes.title: Completely and utterly disappointing
attributes.review: i just cant believe it. this took hours to download for no actual reason. i downloaded tiktok at the same time and it downloaded first. when it finally downloaded it kept crashing. if i could give it 0 stars i would. NOBODY DOWNLOAD THIS unless you’re an @ unusual human being ;)

attributes.title: I can’t believe they let this happen
attributes.review: when i downloaded it not only did it take hours due to data uptake it had on my phone... but it also deleted ALL of my pictures 😡😡 my MAGA rally pictures were on there including my selfie with candace owens!! will NOT be recommending this horrid app to my friends and family

attributes.title: Terrible app🤢😡
attributes.review:
I thought everyone was joking about it taking forever to download, it took 23 min to download, like seriously? 🤨after opening it it kept crashing and I had to restart my phone every time. How did this even get put on the App Store? Don’t waste your time on this app. -10/10 👎🏻👎🏻

F&@k Donald trump, all my ni**as hate Donald trump

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: not worth it... i was looking for reasons to support trump with this app, but i started getting ALMOST 50 notifications EVERYDAY from the app. CRAZY STUFF telling me that trump would watch me sleep!!!! i was getting really scared... now everyday i have to sleep with the lights on & im very sensitive to light so i’m PRACTICALLY BLIND now. yeah, i’m using the voice thing on here because of this TERRIBLE app.

attributes.title: DO BETTER
attributes.review: Worst app EVER!!!!!! If I could give it 0/5 stars I would!!!! It took nearly 56 weeks to download and when it finished I couldn’t even open the app. It kept closing every time I tried to open it. I really want to be informed with the current election so I can vote this upcoming November for my FAVORITE PRESIDENT EVER! 🧚🏻💕 i really hope they try to do better so we win👀

attributes.title: Ruined my whole life honestly
attributes.review: literally was just waiting for it download & it turns out i had to wait 6 months ?!??? that is insane. my expectations were low and i was STILL disappointed. worst app on the app store to be honest. if it were up to me, i would take it down. 🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮. trump you tried, don’t do it ever again 🧚✨

attributes.title: The most horrible app I had ever downloaded 😪
attributes.review: When I downloaded it I had to wait 1 week for it to download, unbelievably unprofessional! This app has never helped anybody. The app had told and taught me very very very ugly and horrible stuff and misleading information! This app has nothing but bad in it! I will never recommend this app to anyone.

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: I am thoroughly disappointed in this app. It runs slows, constantly closes, & I think it’s giving my information to China 😳😳🤭. Also.......ITS ALL FAKE NEWS. I expected more from a President who prides himself on authenticity & facts. 0/10. I would not recommend this app to anyone. Truly, save your time. It’s almost as bad as Fox News and that’s saying a lot.

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD!
attributes.review: This app took forever to download. As soon as I got on my phone started to glitch and I tried to leave the app and it wouldn’t let me. My phone was frozen on the app until it died. When I went to plug it in and when it turned on it showed the white hello screen as if I got a new phone. And wiped all my data away.!!

attributes.title: Horrible App!!
attributes.review: I was very very mad about this app. It showed pictures of rats on it and it is ran by a disgusting man, Donald Trump. So very disgusted by this. Nobody should have to go through what us people saw when we opened the app, we saw Donald Trump dressed as a Shopkin. So very mad that I wasted my time on this app. I do not recommend getting the app. So very bad. Never again will I. Good day.
